myfuel.Client

Class MyFuelClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • myfuel.ocsf.client.ObservableClient
        • myfuel.Client.MyFuelClient

  • public class MyFuelClient
extends ObservableClient
    Client side implement Using the OCSF Framework. Using Observe/Observable pattern for manage all messages received from server and notify all the controllers needed these messages.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class myfuel.ocsf.client.ObservableClient

        CONNECTION_CLOSED, CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED, CONNECTION_EXCEPTION

      Create new Client connection.

      Hook method called after the connection has been closed.

      Hook method called each time an exception is raised by the client listening thread.

      This method received the Request object from the GUI Controller and sent it to the server.
      protected void handleMessageFromServer(java.lang.Object msg)
      This method is used to handle messages from the server.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method for client side, opens new connection dialog.
